mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.addr_pro AS "addrPro", a.addr_city AS "addrCity", a.addr_area AS "addrArea", a.addr_detail AS "addrDetail", a.contact_person AS "contactPerson", a.phone_num AS "phoneNum", a.balance_model AS "balanceModel", a.collect_fees AS "collectFees", a.balance_cycle AS "balanceCycle", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_info( id, company_name, addr_pro, addr_city, addr_area, addr_detail, contact_person, phone_num, balance_model, collect_fees, balance_cycle, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{companyName}, #{addrPro}, #{addrCity}, #{addrArea}, #{addrDetail}, #{contactPerson}, #{phoneNum}, #{balanceModel}, #{collectFees}, #{balanceCycle}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
